forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Widespread Fog then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: Widespread fog and a chance of rain showers before 2pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 79, with temperatures falling to around 77 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 60. East northeast wind 1 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
